page.title: 14Chinley Independent Chapel
page.content: The little church in Chinley called Chinley Independent Chapel is where a number of people go every Sunday morning to sing songs and listen to different people talk about God. It was built in 1711 and has been restored twice. The Hymn Board is surrounded with its own history. No-one knows by whom or where it was made. During the restoration of the Chapel in 1908 it was found in the foundations. The Chapel serves three hamlets, Chapel Milton, New Smithy and The Wash.The burial ground contains many memories of the dead, including nineteen ministers who have served the Chapel. It always has freshly picked flowers in vases and when the sun shines through the windows on the blue paint,it looks like the sky. {by Sarah Ball
